name: The Truth (Phoegasus)
description:
You have been chosen by the Gods to fulfill the prophecy.

With the help of the witch, get to the Temple of the Seven.

Prove your worth by obtaining the Orb of Truth.

Then the Gods shall grant you the power to defeat the great evil.

But the path to the Orb is far from easy.

Only those with the purest hearts may succeed.

Are you worthy of that power ?

Are the prophecies even true ?

There's only one way to find out...

(Made in 17 hours as part of the RPG Maker Jam. Hints and Solutions.)
